DOC.brief_summary: Investigate the supersaturation and precipitation behaviour of diclofenac in the stomach of healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Supersaturation and Precipitation of Diclofenac in the Stomach of Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteers Age 20 35 years Illness Acute / Chronic gastric disorder Use of medicine (possible) pregnancy Frequent exposure to Xrays during the past year HIV / Hepatitis B Virus or Hepatitis C Virus infection
